thread.title: Line unveils a new Android launcher app

title: Line unveils a new Android launcher app
text:
Line unveils a new Android launcher app 
Technology Industry News.Net (ANI) : Wednesday 2nd September, 2015 
Japanese messaging company Line has launched a new launcher app for Android. 
According to the TechCrunch, the new app allows the user to customize the look, feel and usage of their device. 
Line updated with new features allows the users to put stickers on their wallpaper and edit the appearance of app icons, while it includes widget shortcuts, utility apps and an integrated search feature. 
The Line launcher also recommends apps for download for its users. (ANI) More Technology Industry News
